amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to prohibit funds for the TechCamp public diplomacy program of the Bureau of Educational & Cultural Affairs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 254 (Roll no. 302).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 254 (Roll no. 302).
